name: TheNewBoston Social Network - Even Darker
description: Makes TheNewBoston Social Network completely dark.
additional_info:
Changelog
  • 4/09/2016 - Fixed text color on friends tab in profile page. Made text color in some buttons more white.
  • 4/08/2016 - Fixed background color of the feed in profile posts bleeding out of the posts
  • 2/25/2016 - IT'S ALIVE. IT'S ALIIIIIVE (again)
  • 7/04/2015 - Fixed quote blocks on forums
  • 4/28/2015 - Fixed background color of text box in forums. removed background image
  • 3/5/2015 - Fixed background wood image
  • 2/22/2015 - Fixed homepage category boxes link color
  • 12/6/2014 - Fixed homepage background color
  • 12/2/2014 - Fixed wrong colors on search page and shortened the style sheet
  • 11/17/2014 - Made it compatible with the domain name change
  • 11/17/2014 - Fixed forum colors
  • 11/6/2014 - Fixed stream background color
  • 11/4/2014 - Fixed colors! :D
  • 11/2/2014 - Fixed background color of video tutorial section and text color of red buttons
  • 10/23/2014 - Tweaked h6 color and background color of some buttons
  • 10/21/2014 - Fixed main logo to not have beta next to it
  • 10/10/2014 - Removed background texture from main divs. Makes it look cleaner and it's easier to read on.
  • 10/8/2014 - Tweaked background colors for body and textarea
  • 10/7/2014 - Fixed background color and image
  • 9/20/2014 - Fixed textarea colors
  • 9/19/2014 - Fixed link, highlighted link, and shop page colors
  • 9/18/2014 - Initial Release
